titles.name: Acrobat
titles.description: Add a negative d6 to all engage attacks made on you

titles.name: Spider
titles.description: Gain a d6 on all acrobat rolls an increase your movement speed by 10

titles.name: Dancer
titles.description: Add a second agility die when you dodge

titles.name: Black Widow
titles.description: You can choose to not make noise when you move

titles.name: Jumping Spider
titles.description: You don't have to make a check trees or other rough surfaces (buildings, etc.)

titles.name: Smoke Dancer
titles.description: You can not be targeted by engage attacks, increase your movement speed by 15, and add a negative d4 to all attacks made on you

titles.name: Water Dancer
titles.description: Eac htime an attack misses you, move 15 feet in any direction and push the attacker

titles.name: Handler
titles.description: You start with a pet

titles.name: Calvary
titles.description: You only need one hand to ride a beast

titles.name: Kennel Master
titles.description: Gain a d8 on handling animals smaller than you

titles.name: Cataphract
titles.description: Your mount gains 2d8 on all confidence rolls

titles.name: Hussar
titles.description: Your mount doubles its movement speed

titles.name: Shepard
titles.description: When you command, you may command a number of animals smaller than you equal to the number of successes on your command roll

titles.name: Beastmaster
titles.description: Choose a beast you have a good relationship with, that beast will attempt to do anything you tell it to do

titles.name: Striker
titles.description: Add a confidence die to strikes

titles.name: Heavy Hitter
titles.description: Increase the maximum damage of strikes by one

titles.name: Martial Artist
titles.description: Roll an agility die instead of the strength die for strikes

titles.name: Wrestler
titles.description: Gain a d6 to tackle rolls and pinning now gives a genative d8

titles.name: Bone Breaker
titles.description: Your strikes gain 1 damage, and deal bludgeoning damage

titles.name: Three-Handed Viper
titles.description: Each time you add negative die to an attack roll and cause the attack to miss. Gain a free strike attack on any opponent

titles.name: Balance Master
titles.description: Gain a boon each time you hit a strike

titles.name: Distraction Artist
titles.description: Gain a d6 to stealth checks made to conceal a dexterity check

titles.name: Brawl Artist
titles.description: Gain a d6 to attacks with the short tag

titles.name: Pocket Artist
titles.description: Gain a d8 when pickpocketing

titles.name: Lock Artist
titles.description: Gain a d8 when lockpicking

titles.name: Knife Dancer
titles.description: When you thorw small weapons, replace your strength die with an agility die and throwing small weapons counts as a strike action, not an attack action

titles.name: Smuggler
titles.description: Your small weapons can not be detected

titles.name: Healer
titles.description: Once every 23 hours you may subtract an amount of harm equl to a focus herbalism roll

titles.name: Mistic
titles.description: Choose a natural terrain. Add a confidence die to healing rolls made in this terrain and gain knowledge of two helpful herbs that grow there

titles.name: Medic
titles.description: Add a confidence die to healing rolls

titles.name: Doctor
titles.description: With proper tools add a d10 to your herbalism roll pool

titles.name: Field Medic
titles.description: You may move a character in critical condition without dealing damage

titles.name: Druidic Traveler
titles.description: Choose two more natural terrains, gain knowledge of four more herbs

titles.name: Unrelenting Shaman
titles.description: Gain knowledge of two more herbs from your terrain and one very useful complex concoction

titles.name: Reader
titles.description: Gain a d6 on perception checks in books

titles.name: Article Reader
titles.description: Developments

titles.name: Great Works Reader
titles.description: Culture

titles.name: Natural Philosopher
titles.description: Natural Philosophy

titles.name: Political Theorist
titles.description: Recent Events / Important People

titles.name: Critic
titles.description: Literature / Art

titles.name: Historian
titles.description: History

titles.name: Marksman
titles.description: Roll a focus die instead of a strength die for your damage die with ranged weapons

titles.name: Deadeye
titles.description: Add 40 feet of range to all ranged weapons. Your aim dice count as damage dice as well

titles.name: Ranger
titles.description: If you hit a ranged attack, gain a free action

titles.name: Deashot
titles.description: Double your aim dice when you aim with a ranged weapon

titles.name: Longshot
titles.description: You may roll all focus die for a ranged attack before you commit to attacking

titles.name: Combined Armor
titles.description: You may make an attack with a small weapon on the same turn you make a ranged attack

titles.name: Gut-Shot Ranger
titles.description: Decrease the range of all ranged weeapons by 40 feet. Add a confidence roll to your pool

titles.name: Warrior
titles.description: When you push an opponent, you may choose the space they move to

titles.name: Fervent Warrior
titles.description: Add an additional strength die to your attacking pool during weapon melee attacks. The damage will be determind by their higher of the two strength die

titles.name: Balanced Warrior
titles.description: Add a confidence die and a focus die to your attacking pool during weapon melee attacks

titles.name: Weakpoint Specialist
titles.description: Deal 2 extra damage to armored opponents when your attack is effective during weapon melee attacks

titles.name: Titan-Swing Warrior
titles.description: When you aim with a slow weapon attack targets may not add negative die to your attack

titles.name: Battle Master
titles.description: Focus die count like strength die for damage during weapon melee attacks

titles.name: Strategist
titles.description: When you aim with a melee weapon, add four d4 as well

titles.name: Naturalist
titles.description: You and your party may walk an additional 5 miles each day

titles.name: Terrain Specialist
titles.description: Gain a d8 instead when making hunting checks in your chosen terrain, you may give a d4 to med rolls made in this terrain

titles.name: Survivalist
titles.description: You gain 1 armor against cold or hot environment damage

titles.name: Land's Shadow
titles.description: Gain a d8 when making stealth or acrobatics checks in you chosen terrain

titles.name: Hunter
titles.description: Gain a 2d8 when making checks to track, attack, tame, or handle you chosen wild animal that is native to your terrain

titles.name: Storm Shade
titles.description: You do not add storm die to your pools in hot or cold weather

titles.name: Storm Warrden
titles.description: Your party gains 2 confidence in storms

titles.name: Soldier
titles.description: You may wear armor

titles.name: Heavy soldier
titles.description: Armor negates one more damage

titles.name: Hardened Soldier
titles.description: You start combats with two negative d6 dice that your may add to any attack targeting you once between now and the end of combat

titles.name: Goliath
titles.description: Armor negates one more damage

titles.name: Battle Brother
titles.description: Lose 5 feet of movement, one person around your can not be attacked before you in a round

titles.name: Shield Wall
titles.description: Shields add two extra d4 to block rolls

titles.name: Fox Footed
titles.description: Negative die from defensive actions d not need to be used before your next turn, only before the end of the combat

titles.name: Mage
titles.description: You may ignite runes

titles.name: Snap Mage
titles.description: It costs one less energy to ignite runes

titles.name: Deepcut Mage
titles.description: It costs one more energy to ignite runes

titles.name: Blink Mage
titles.description: It costs no energy to ignite runes and does not take an action

titles.name: Split Mage
titles.description: You may have an additional rune

titles.name: Cyclic Mage
titles.description: You add an extra d10 to your rune rolls when in the right light. Add a negative d10 when you're in the inverse light

titles.name: Polar Mage
titles.description: Choose one: Hellian - Each time you ignite a rune, you may make a rune roll. Deal the number of successess in damage to everyone in a 40 foot range. Stellian - Each time you ignite a rune you unignite all other runes in a 40 foot radius

titles.name: Speaker
titles.description: You may roll a focus speech roll to "know a guy" for one action once a session

titles.name: Proper Speaker
titles.description: Gin a d6 when making speech rolls in high class situations

titles.name: Street Spekar
titles.description: Gain a d6 when making speech rolls in low class situations

titles.name: Observant Speaker
titles.description: Gain a d10 toa ll focus rolls made in the middle of conversation

titles.name: Posh Speaker
titles.description: Gain a second d6 when making speech rolls in high class situations. Gain two negative d6s when making speech rolls in low class situations

titles.name: Hypeman
titles.description: Gain a second d6 when making speech rolls in low lass situations. Gain two negative d6 when making speechs rolls in high class situations

titles.name: Loud Mouth
titles.description: You may take the taunt action

titles.name: Rouge
titles.description: Gain a d6 to any pool or roll that has a focus die in it when sneaking around

titles.name: Assassin
titles.description: Attacking a surprised target with an attack with the short tag deals 4 more damage

titles.name: Rouge Commander
titles.description: A maximum of three people may follow you while you sneak around. replace two of your agility die with two f your group member's agility die when making stealth rolls

titles.name: Shadow
titles.description: Each time you get a stealth boon, gain another

titles.name: Brutalizing Assassin
titles.description: Attacking a surprise target causes all enemies who notice to lose 2 confidence for an hour

titles.name: Ghost
titles.description: Attacking a surprised target with no witnessess with an attack with the short tag ignores energy and deals 2 additional damage

titles.name: Follower
titles.description: Gain one energy

titles.name: Zealot
titles.description: You may forgo any amount of recovery and instead gain a pool of d6s equaal to the number of point forwent. this pool may not go larger than your focus and ma be added to any roll that contains a confidence die

titles.name: Congregant
titles.description: When anyone else in your party gains recovery die they gain an additional d6

titles.name: Zealot of Sacrement
titles.description: You have a 10 minute ritual that subtracts 2 energy nd allows you to add a confidence die to your next roll

titles.name: Dream Zealot
titles.description: Once a day you may spend all of your energy (you must have at least four left) to enter

titles.name: Avenging Divine
titles.description: When anyone in your party suffers harm, you gain a d4 to add to any roll against the offending party in the next turn

titles.name: Sage
titles.description: Once per week, allow each of your party members to roll a confidence worship roll, and gain energy equal to the number of successes

titles.name: Twitch
titles.description: Gain one energy

titles.name: Bastard
titles.description: You may not have speech titles. Gain an additional confidence die when intimidating someone

titles.name: Lunatic
titles.description: Gain a point of energy (overflow allowed) when you start any combat

titles.name: Crazy Bastard
titles.description: You don't accumulate harm dice, you are not told how much damage you take

titles.name: Bloodless Bastard
titles.description: If you are the first person to take damage in a fight, don't

titles.name: Craze Lunatic
titles.description: During your surprise rounds your attacks subtract 2 sonfidence from the target on a hit. You may not take titles in the stealth tree

titles.name: Manic Lunatic
titles.description: At the start of combat you may choose to enter a rage. If you do, your attacks deal 2 more damage, your movement is doubled, you may not make ranged attacks, and you are auto hit by attackers you did not deal damage to last round. The rage ends when you sleep

titles.name: Craftsman
titles.description: You gain an understanding of material and craftwork

titles.name: Blacksmith
titles.description: You can psend an hour improving metal gear. The user gain a d6 o the next roll they make with that piece of gear

titles.name: Woodworker
titles.description: You can spend an hour improving non-metal gear. The user gains a d6 to the next roll they make with that piece of gear

titles.name: Weapon Maker
titles.description: When you make the melee weapon, you may add the swing, smash, engage, or reach tag

titles.name: Armor Maker
titles.description: When you make armor, choose a damage type, the wearer adds two to their armor score against that damage type

titles.name: Fletcher
titles.description: when you make a ranged weapon, it may use melee combat boon when it gains a boon

titles.name: Siege Master
titles.description: When you take this title you gain a large siege engine (ship, battle wagon, balista, up to DM discretion

titles.name: Alchemist
titles.description: You can cook alchemy

titles.name: Grenadier
titles.description: You may carry two additional solid concoctions

titles.name: Tonicist
titles.description: You may carry two additional solutions

titles.name: Heavy Shell Grenadier
titles.description: When you hit a character with a concoction they take a d4 of damager

titles.name: Thin Shell Grenadier
titles.description: When you hit a character with a concoction effect an adjacent character as well

titles.name: Chemist
titles.description: You may add two solutes to a solution, but must subtract 2 from the concentration

titles.name: Mass Tonicist
titles.description: When you make a solution, make two
